titles: Scotlands thanksgiving to the Lord for her armies safe, joyfull and prosperous returning from England.
date: in the yeare that our armie came heer 1641.
notes: Verse: "Blest be the living Lord, who reignes above ..."
Signed: Hadingtoun, August. 28, 1641. M. Patrick Hamiltoune minister at Cambuslang.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Ireland --  History --  Rebellion of 1641 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
Scotland --  History --  Charles I, 1625-1649 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
